description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.5m in depth, maximum height of 3.51m and eaves height of 2.80m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

You cannot apply for a Section 73 application to amend a Certificate of Lawfulness. If you wish to make changes that fall outside of permitted development rules then you will need to apply for retrospective planning permission for the extension. Please confirm how you wish to proceed as you will receive a refund for the fees for this application if you request to withdraw it.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that Condition 11 (Public Realm Management Plan) of planning permission 22/02905/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
